DOC.brief_summary: Study to investigate the efficacy and safety of GL2702 GLARS-NF1tablet and Harnal-D - tablet in benign prostatic hyperplasia patients with lower urinary tract symptomatic
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of GL2702 GLARS-NF1tablet and Harnal-D - Tablet in BPH Patients With LUTS
DOC.detailed_description: GL2702 GLARS-NF1 tablet is controlled released formation which is made by GL Pharm Tech
DOC.criteria: Over 50 years old, BPH diagnosted, Adult Male Subject IPSS ≥ 13 point PSA < 4ng/mL 5ml/sec < Qmax ≤ 15ml/sec Prostatic cancer 250ml < PVR ALT or AST > 2 times (Upper Normal Range) Total Bilirubin > 1.5 times (Upper Normal Range) Treated with αadrenalin receptor blocker within 2weeks before screening Treated with 5AlphaReductase Inhibitor within 6 months before screening Treated with phytotherapy within 2weeks before screening Treated with Anabolic Steroid within 6 months before screening
